version.description: The version number of this JSON schema

lab_name.description: The name of the lab that is doing the boot tests

job.description: The job associated with this boot report

kernel.description: The kernel associated with this boot report

defconfig.description: The name of the defconfig as reported by the CI loop

defconfig_full.description: The full name of the defconfig with config fragments information

board.description: The name of the board: it must be a valid and recognized name

board_instance.description: The instance identifier for the board

device_type.description: The device type associated with the board

arch.description: The architecture type of this board

git_branch.description: The branch used for boot testing

git_commit.description: The git SHA of the commit used for boot testing

git_describe.description: The name of the git describe command

boot_retries.description: The number of boot retries that have been performed

boot_result.description: The final status of the boot test

boot_result_description.description: The description of the boot result, useful to provide a cause of a failure

boot_log.description: The name of the boot log file in text format

boot_log_html.description: The name of the boot log file in HTML format

boot_time.description: The number of seconds it took to boot the board: iternally it will be converted into milliseconds from the epoch time

boot_warnings.description: The number of warnings detected during the boot

dtb.description: The DTB file or directory used

kernel_image.description: The kernel image used to boot

email.description: Optional email address to be notified if the boot report import fails

file_server_url.description: The URL where boot log files, or other related files, are stored

file_server_resource.description: The server path where the boot related files are stored

mach_alias.description: The alternative machine (SoC) family; when defined it will override the 'mach' field

metadata.description: A free form object that can contain different properties

qemu_command.description: Full command line used to start qemu

chainloader.description: Description of the chainloader used, if any

bootloader.description: The name of the bootloader used

bootloader_version.description: The version of the bootloader used

boot_job_url.description: The URL of the boot test executor; this should include the schema and authority parts of the URI

boot_job_path.description: The path where the boot test job can be found; this should be the path part of the URI

boot_job_id.description: The ID of the job that ran the boot test as reported by the boot test executor
